State of Illinois
Cook County SS: }

Benjamin H Skinner of said County being duly sworn saith that he is the Proprietor of the mert^r^opolitan Hotel in the City of Chicago, and that one Silas L. Freeman was for about two years Porter in said Hotel & that during said time the said Freeman was remarkably attentive to his business & had the full confidence & respect of his employer as a young man of excellent habits & character.

And this Deponent further saith that the young man Freeman enjoyed an excellent reputation among his friends and acquaintances for honesty & integrity and was never as this Deponent believes charged with any criminal offence but on the contrary thereof seemed to be free from any bad habits or associations.
Sworn before me this 23 Day of May 1864.

O. R. W. Lull
Notary Public
